result.name: stable-isotope-and-u-th-speleothem-measurements-from-vietnam-200000334-years-bp
result.notes: [This dataset is embargoed until November 1, 2025]. The data includes carbon and oxygen stable isotopes together with top and bottom U-Th ages of stalagmites collected in Northwest, Central and Southern Vietnam. The purpose of this work was to identify suitable specimens that can be used for palaeoclimatic reconstructions. The stalagmites collected were found broken in-situ, and the exact location of the caves is not given here for cave protection purposes. The stalagmites were collected in February and March 2023, and geochemical analyses performed between April and December 2023. Full details about this dataset can be found at https://doi.org/10.5285/f1415ba4-35cd-40db-a717-db6693b03eb0

organization.name: eidc
organization.title: Environmental Information Data Centre
organization.description:
The Environmental Information Data Centre (EIDC) is the UK's national data centre for terrestrial and freshwater sciences.

The EIDC is one of the network of Natural Environment Research Council (NERC) data centres that provide a focal point for its scientific data and information.

The EIDC is hosted by the UK Centre for Ecology & Hydrology (UKCEH), a world-class, independent, not-for-profit research organisation focusing on land and freshwater ecosystems and their interaction with the atmosphere. UKCEH integrates UK-wide observation systems and curiosity driven research, from the smallest scale of genetic diversity to large-scale, whole-Earth systems. We work across disciplines and facilitate academic, public, private and voluntary sector partnerships. UKCEH’s extensive, long-term monitoring, analysis and modelling deliver UK and global environmental data, providing early warnings of change and management solutions for our land and freshwaters.

result.title: Stable isotope and U/Th speleothem measurements from Vietnam, 200,000–334 years BP

extras.value: ["Embargoed", "If you reuse this data, you should cite: Ersek, V., Bendle, J. (2024). Stable isotope and U/Th speleothem measurements from Vietnam, 200,000\u2013334 years BP. NERC EDS Environmental Information Data Centre https://doi.org/10.5285/f1415ba4-35cd-40db-a717-db6693b03eb0"]
